## Group Stage Standings
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
standings_raw <-read.csv("/Users/jacktarricone/Desktop/twitter/group_stage_points.csv")
standings_ordered <-standings_raw[order(standings_raw$points, decreasing = TRUE),]
print(standings_ordered)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
mean <-signif(mean(standings_ordered$points), digits = 3)
median <-median(standings_ordered$points)
range <-24-13
min <-min(standings_ordered$points)
max <-max(standings_ordered$points)

Stat <-c("Mean","Median","Range","Min","Max")
Value <-c(mean,median,range,min,max)
stats <-as.data.frame(cbind(Stat,Value))
print(stats, row.names = FALSE)
```
